roleManager.description: This page is dedicated to managing user roles within the site. It allows for the assignment and adjustment of roles to ensure proper access control and responsibility distribution across the team.

attestatorsManager.title: Manage preferred attestors
attestatorsManager.subtitle: Highlight trusted voices across your site
attestatorsManager.description: Select and manage preferred users whose attestations will appear at the top of relevant content and be marked with a checkmark icon. This feature helps surface trusted opinions and enhances credibility for your readers.
